title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: This is mind-blowing but at least a happy-ending https://www.insider.com/iowa-teen-told-pay-150k-alleged-rapist-family-killed-reports-2022-9

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: At a dollar a day, that should only take her about 400 years to pay it off.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I feel so disgusted that such a American state law even exists, this law doesn’t make sense at all to pay restitution especially when you’re the victim of rape. I believe the judge made a mistake in this case; the judge still wants to still decide on whether they will accept donated money to pay back the restitution that the victim’s family was able to gather by creating a GoFundMe campaign. In my opinion, I believe it should be the other way around and have the rapist’s family pay the restitution to the victim if anything.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I am not sure what the feeling to have for this is but this girl who killed her alleged rapist has now escaped from custody.  I wish she just stayed there because now she violated her probation will be forced to serve 20 years if she is caught. I think she will be caught very soon and this will be a big regret she made https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2022/nov/06/iowa-pieper-lewis-escapes-custody

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: Quote from: mich on September 17, 2022, 07:02:09 AMI feel so disgusted that such a American state law even exists, this law doesn’t make sense at all to pay restitution especially when you’re the victim of rape. I believe the judge made a mistake in this case; the judge still wants to still decide on whether they will accept donated money to pay back the restitution that the victim’s family was able to gather by creating a GoFundMe campaign. In my opinion, I believe it should be the other way around and have the rapist’s family pay the restitution to the victim if anything.   I do not agree that the family of the rapist should pay compensation. Of course, there are different cases, but let's assume that these people themselves didn't know who their relative was. How can they be responsible for it? He is an adult person he made his own decisions and the blame for what he did is fully on him. It is very dangerous to spread the blame of one person on many like this, it removes responsibility from the true culprit.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Usually taking a life can be seen as one of the worst crimes that can be committed, however in this case maybe she can be excused, at least by us.I hope the rapist rots in hell.
